sentence: Before receiving his Ph.D. for atomic models of alkali metals from Massachusetts Institute of Technology in 1924, he spent the 1922-23 academic year as a Fellow of The American-Scandinavian Foundation at the University of Copenhagen under Niels Bohr and Hans Kramers.

examples.sentence: ...society in 1918 the cameron prize for therapeutics of the university of edinburgh in 1922 and the...
examples.entity: Cameron Prize for Therapeutics of the University of Edinburgh

examples.sentence: ...in 1922 and the copley medal of the royal society in 1926...
examples.entity: Copley Medal of the Royal Society
